archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Manage Aged Party Debt Portfolio
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Manage the aged party debt portfolio.

properties.value: Manage Aged Party Debt Portfolio produces aged party debt portfolio report to assist in managing party debt and candidates for write-off. It identifies and possibly writes off a bad party debt. It establishes and manages commercial arrangements with third parties for the recovery of aged party debt, and/or selling of parts of the debt portfolio to one or more third parties. It also conducts trend analysis on party debt.
